lines.text:
[to Momo]
You're nothing but a shit.

[after having sex with Stella]
She's a nymphomaniac all right.

[about Girls]
They ain't virgins, you can tell by the way they walk, ain't that so Bobby?
What you afraid of, stick around, man, maybe you'll get laid.
Not with freaks like that.
Their not so bad.
You mean you could screw those two over there?
If Huey can do it, I bet you can too.
Oh bullshit, Huey doesn't even know what screwing's all about.
Man, look at them, fresh for the picking.
It ain't no dick, it's more like a monster.

[after Benji and Bobby ditch him]
You couple of bastards.

[Benji's staring at Nicki]
You'll strain your eye balls pal.
Do you know her?
Who the four eyed broad?
No, the other one, turkey!
That's Nicki.
Nicki?
Yeah, a new babe in town.
Benji, what are you doing there?
Baking a cake.
Turn that radio down immediatly, do you think you live alone?
Ah, stop your nagging.
Don't talk to me like that, better remember I'm your mother.

[about Benji]
Ramek, your not going to let him leave the house dressed up like a gangster.
It's time for a little more passion, come on casanova, hey, put some soul into it baby.

[about Benji and Martha]
I'd like to see them hit it off, huh.
Have we done that?
What?
Hit it off.
You tell her that I love her forever more.
Sure Benny, I'll tell her that your love is highly spiritual.
Move your fat ass, time is money!
Bobby, are you positive water will drown these crabs?
Positive.
I thought animals liked water.
Not fleas or lice.

[about Nicki]
Why I copped her cherry.
What?
I screwed her, didn't I.
Your lying!
I took her in a boat, honest I did, and I fucked her, alright.

[about Nicki]
I may have screwed her, who says I was the only one.
I love you Nikki, from the first day, but I didn't know how to tell you, I love you Nikki and I know it's forever, I love you Nikki.
